title: Pronoun
content: He is a teacher. His car is red. I saw him in front of the school. She is a teacher. Her car is red. I saw her in front of the school. They are teachers. Their car is red. I saw them in front of the school. We are teachers. Our car is red. You can see us in front of the school. I am a teacher. My car is red. You can see me in front of the school.
